text: Lyubov Igorevna Nikitina (; born 21 January 1999) is a Russian freestyle skier who competes internationally. She participated at the 2018 Winter Olympics and the FIS Freestyle Ski and Snowboarding World Championships 2019, winning a medal.Aerials results Her brother Stanislav Nikitin is also a freestyle skier.Станислав и Любовь Никитины – чемпионы России в лыжной акробатике ==World Cup podiums== ===Individual podiums=== * 0 wins * 1 podiums {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%;" !
